caption_text:
It’s happening. Count on it: Saturday October 19th at the Button Factory, the second Ecstatic Dance of our Fall series, is going to be an outright banger. We’ve booked two true masters of their craft to hold this space for us, and we ain’t into hyperbole (at least not today). ATTILA THE SPUN is a local DJ widely recognized for his deliciously inventive, melodic genre-mashing AND his ruthlessly danceable beats. Follow that with a Sound Healing offered by NATASHA ÁINE–a consistent, powerful, and respected healer long-standing in our community–and you can expect a night that will move your body along with everything that’s ready to move within you. 

All the details are below. Tell everyone you know.

THE SCHEDULE IS:
7:30 - 8:00 pm | Doors Open 
8:00 - 8:15 pm | Opening Circle 
8:15 - 10:30 pm |  DANCE
10:30 - 11:00 pm | Sound Bath & Integration

INTRODUCING ATTILA THE SPUN
@attila_the_spun has been moving dance floors for 15 years, formerly as a club DJ in Waterloo. Focusing primarily on house and techno, he seamlessly sprinkles in bits of other genres, so it’s not unusual to hear garage, electro, or jungle woven into his sets. Expect classics, future classics, and obscurities—all curated to keep you dancing.

FEATURING THE ARTWORK of Bangishimo Johnston @bangishimo who will be offering this month’s aesthetic blessing to our space.

AND TO CLOSE OUR DANCE, we’ll gather ‘round the sonic flame now gentled and calm, tended by @alegacyoflight who will be offering Sound Healing to support our grounding and integration.

Tickets: Link in bio / https://EDKW.eventbrite.com
